data.author: BOBdotEXE

changelog.release_notes:
+Bass no longer blinks every 5 seconds, (lol)
+Improved Shadow color

data.description:
True bass would never be caught dead in a pet, 
but, rockmanEXE 4.5 happened...
This is the first EVER Custom navi to be built with the NEW Navi Engine 2.8, 
He scoffs at megaman and his measly 100HP, while he boasts his massive 1,000HP! (HP = your battery life with an extra '0', so 1000= 100%, 600=60% 200=20% etc, when the battery is low, the text will turn red, so you will not get 100HP and 100% confused)

This is mainly made to show off the new open source navi engine 2.8,
If you want to make your own navi with no programming required check out the tutorial!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XBmKnDOhC7c
data.title: Bass / Forte PET

changelog.release_notes: Recompiled with SDK v4 to support Pebble 2 series.

data.title: BIG again

data.author: BV Designs

changelog.release_notes: Version 2.61:  Now available for Pebble Time 2!

Version 2.0: NEW features added! 
- New-look configuration page 
- Improved look and visibility 
- Option to change date formats (UK & US style) 
- Option to vibrate when disconnected
- Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel 
- Date displays the language chosen in user settings

The most delicious watchface you've ever seen!! Watchface displays a pie, with the missing slice representing the current time in analogue format. The remaining piece shows the battery level, digital time, date and AM/PM respectively (if 12 hour). This display will show up in different places on the face depending on the time, showing as much detail as possible. The colours are not customisable, but the when the Bluetooth is disconnected the pie disappears and only the time, battery and date will show (white on black). In the configuration menu, the clock can only be updated every minute if desired to save battery. Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users. Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

data.description:
Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!
--------------------------------------------------------------------Version 2.0: NEW features added!
- New-look configuration page
- Improved look and visibility
- Option to change date formats (UK & US style) 
- Option to vibrate when disconnected
- Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel
- Date displays the language chosen in user settings

-----------------------------------------------------------------

The most delicious watchface you've ever seen!!

Watchface displays a pie, with the missing slice representing the current time in analogue format.  The remaining piece shows the battery level, digital time, date and AM/PM respectively (if 12 hour).  This display will show up in different places on the face depending on the time, showing as much detail as possible.

The colours are not customisable, but when the Bluetooth is disconnected the pie disappears and only the time, battery and date will show (white on black).  Vibrates with each connection status.

In the configuration menu, the clock can only be updated every minute if desired to save battery. Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users.

Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2.61:  Now available for Pebble Time 2!

data.title: PieWatch

data.author: Noah Scarbrough

changelog.release_notes: - Added icon for onboard watchface picker

Biggest update yet!

- Info Bar is now open source! :D Source code can be obtained by copy/paste out of the main description
- Big improvements to conserve battery life and processor memory.
- Weekday slot is slightly larger so it is even easier to read
- Numerous behind the scenes changes for better performance and cleaner code

Thank you so much for all the hearts and installs! I never thought it would go this far.

- Information bar redesign, now showing day of the week!
- Made tweaks to the interface, especially on round displays for a more balanced experience
- Cleaned up some code

Thank you for your support!

data.description:
Info Bar is a basic digital watchface, but with a unique twist. A unified bar of important information spans across the middle of the watch. This is a useful design for looking at more than just the time without clutter getting in the way.
 
Shows:
 - Time
 - Seconds
 - Day of the week
 - Date
 - Battery percentage
 
...all in an easy to read arrangement. Enjoy this and please leave a heart for a 16 year old amateur coder! Be sure to check out my new Android M watchface as well.
 
Supports all watches! Only in English at this time.

latest_release.release_notes: - Added icon for onboard watchface picker

data.title: Info Bar

data.author: Bleu St-Laurent
data.description: This wachface represents a combat ship. The symbolism of maritime codes is used to display the date information, battery and Bluetooth. The colors and shapes were selected to maximize readability in low light. The day of the month is always visible. Other information can be masked by the hands. The red flag indicates that the ship is in active combat. The blue and yellow flag indicates the date. The white and red flag with Bluetooth says: “I am disabled; communicate with me”. The blue and white flag with the battery says: “My vessel is stopped and making no way through the water”.
data.title: Old Navy by Bleu St-Laurent

data.description:
Analog watch face using lightsabers from Star Wars: The Force Awakens. 

Where the shorter (blue) lightsaber is closest to the edge marks the hour, in normal analog positions.

The point where the larger (red) lightsaber, with crossguard blades, meets the edge of the screen, marks the minute.

The lightsabers have a random movement to where the handle is shown, so do not appear in the same positions when the same time is shown.   They also do not always clash.

 

Screenshots: 1:50, 3:25, 12:00, 9:55, 8:37


Star Wars & Lightsabers are TM & © Lucasfilm Ltd. All Rights Reserved.


Watchface Design & Programming Copyright © 2015 Nev Rawlins

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble firmware V4, Pebble 2, Pebble Time 2 and Quick Views

changelog.release_notes:

data.description:
Have a glance at the street. Be surprised what happens during a day near to a tram station. An intelligent algorithm controls the activity to take the charging level of the battery into account. In addition it's a smart watchface with a lot of information gathered from internet. Rather additive the time, day and date (in nearly any language), the bluetooth connection as well as the battery state is shown. A tap of your wrist will in any case start a truck. It brings a billboard showing InfoPanels into the screen. The InfoPanels are switched in 60 sec delay or by accelerator control. Also a billboard at the trum bridge shows randomly selected short infos. Shown are the weather, the forecast of your current/ a selected fixed location, stock/currency values and up to 3 news feeds/ google alerts. But you can disable/ enable infos in the settings. 

Have fun! ;)

latest_release.release_notes:
* added russian language
* intelligent activity mgmt. according the remaining battery charging level
* small refactoring
* some optimizations

data.title: TramStation

changelog.release_notes: * Modificado el escudo en la versión para Aplite (Blanco y Negro)
* Problema resuelto: Los caracteres con acento en la fecha ahora se muestran correctamente.

Versión 2.0 
============
* Añadido tiempo atmosférico (temperatura).
* Añadida página de configuración para ajustar la frecuencia de actualización de la temperatura.
* Cambiadas las fuentes tipográficas de la hora y fecha.
* (Arreglado) Ahora aparece el icono en la lista de esferas.
Modificado el escudo en la versión para Aplite.
* Corregida la posición del escudo. (Correctamente centrado)
Añadido soporte para determinar el estado de la conexión Bluetooth mediante icono y vibración.

Primera versión de la esfera con el escudo de la S.A.D. Ponferradina (Equipo de fútbol de 2ª División Española).

First version of the watchface with the Ponferradina's logo (Second Division football team in Spain).

data.author: kametman
data.description: Semi-abstract watchface. Hour displayed numerically in middle (24-hour format supported). Squares surrounding hour displays minutes. Big squares for every ten minutes, small squares for every one. Time displayed in screens: 7:48, 7:49, 7:50. Date displayed below hour. Battery indicator at top of screen. Full bar = fully charged. Each medium segment = 30%. Each block = 10%. 80% displayed in screens. Bars hollow out when charging (2nd screen). Month indicator at bottom of screen. Will hollow out on Bluetooth disconnect (except current month). Vibrates on Bluetooth connect/disconnect.
data.title: KaMet Seven

* Change colors background or black background.
* More heroes will come in next release!

(include Mario, Zelda, Megaman, Double Dragon, Ninja Gaiden, Castlevania, Dig Dug, Donkey Kong, Final Fantasy, Kirby, Kung Fu, Bomber man, Dragonball, Adventure Island, Balloon Fight, Galaxian, Metroid, Goonies, Battletoads, Spy, Pacman, Gradius, TMNT, TwinBee, Urban Champion, 1943, Saint Seiya, Punch Out, Duck Tales, Kidi carus, Tennis, Baseball, and more from Nintendo Famicom......) 

超過50個紅白機的經典角色, 隨機出現在你的錶盤上! 帶你回到歡樂的童年時光!

* 每分鐘都會換一個經典英雄角色.
* 甩動你的手錶, 就可以立即更新角色.
* 低電量提示與藍牙斷線提示.
* 下個版本會有更多角色, 敬請期待!

latest_release.release_notes:
* add configuration screen 
* add disconnect vibration
* add background color change

data.author: jas-b

changelog.release_notes:
Made battery arc thicker.
Fixed countdown to not show 60 sec.

Added more graphics detail.
Added bluetooth connection status and battery level indication.

data.description:
The Death Star approaches.
Inspired by Start Wars episode 4. This watchface counts down til the next hour when the death star will be in range. The image updates every 5 minutes.
v1.1: More detail added. The moon icon turns light blue if bluetooth is disconnected and the length of the outside line shows your battery level.

latest_release.release_notes:
Made battery arc thicker.
Fixed countdown to not show 60 sec.

data.title: Death Star Range

data.author: Heath_Palmer
data.description: This watch face allows you to see the time, date, and Link's Legend of Zelda Twilight Princess shield (Color Shield) on your wrist.
data.title: Link's Shield - Twilight Princess - Color or White Background

data.author: John Clute

changelog.release_notes: Increased text layer size for time and removed lines dividing the different watch sections.  It now looks like it is all on the same background.

Created a similar, watch face to informr, except move uptime to the top, and used another font that is easy to see.
Used a new background color, light gray, or white for aplite, and oxford blue or black (aplite) for text.

Found that I at times I wanted to know what day it was, so added day of week to the date line.

data.description:
Created an watch face that is easier to use with out the background light.
Top: Battery charge and Up time since last time charged.
Second line: Time
Third Line: Day and Date
Bottom Line: Bluetooth connected to phone.

latest_release.release_notes: Increased text layer size for time and removed lines dividing the different watch sections.  It now looks like it is all on the same background.

data.title: PTimeStats: ptstats

data.author: Mike D
data.description:
Analog watchface with a 24 hour hand, date and weather. 
A tap input (shaking the watch) will display a second hand for 2 minutes. 

Quick launch to Info Timer for a seamless, multi-functional experience.
data.title: Zenith GMT

data.author: Benjamin
data.description:
Simple binary Watchface. 

The top row is representing hours while bottom row shows minutes.

Shake Pebble within 5 seconds after the start of the Watch Face to display the decimal time too.
data.title: Binary Clock

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views
Note.  Requires Pebble firmware 3.8 or above to run.

data.description:
The story behind this watchface:
"In a far future, the human race will be enslaved by an extraterrestrial civilization. A group of humans travel back through time, taking refuge in different historical periods unable to return to their present time. This group is known as the RENEGADES. Their mission: to provide information to prevent the enslavement of the human race in the future.

RENEGADE watchface is a tribute to these defenders of freedom."

12 tall blocks are the hours,  5 medium height blocks are each 10 minutes and 9 small blocks are single minutes.
The blocks "light up" for each (blue for hours, yellow for 10 minutes and white for single minutes).   Just count the blocks for the time.

AM/PM are represented by the lit circle top right.  Month, day of week and day of month also shown.


Screenshots:
(1)   3:25PM (Sunday, December 20)
(2) 12:59PM (Wednesday, December 30)
(3)   1:11AM (Monday, January 11)
(4) 11:35AM (Monday, December 12)


This watchface design was created by José Manuel Otero, from Spain, and is published with his permission.   You can follow him on:
https://www.facebook.com/TTM-Technotimemachine-578290348850436/timeline/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views

data.title: Renegade

data.author: linearcircles
data.description:
This watchface displays the digital time with a shadow to make it pop! Your watch's battery level is displayed above with a row of circles, and the date is located below the time.
Compatible with Basalt and Chalk.
data.title: IndigoPop

data.author: Digital Jelly

changelog.release_notes: First version. Improved assets and colours to be added in future versions.

data.description:
Droogs unite! A watchface inspired by the movie classic.

Tell the time by counting the "eye lashes", for hours, and read the digits in the iris for minutes. 12-hour clock will display "am" or "pm", in the white of the eye.

For example:

- Screenshot 1 shows "3:09am"
- Screenshot 2 shows "12:01"

For Time Round, only.

latest_release.release_notes: First version. Improved assets and colours to be added in future versions.

data.title: Clockwork

data.author: BV Designs

changelog.release_notes: Version 2.62: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!

Version 2.0: NEW features added!
 - New-look configuration page
 - LIVE preview - options change directly on watch before pressing Save
 - Option to change date formats (UK & US style)
 - Option to vibrate when disconnected
 - Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel
Minor release to improve the battery percentage refresh.

Watchface with a simple, elegant look which displays the day of the month in the middle, and battery level below, as well as the time in analogue format.  The clock border displays when the watch is Bluetooth connected, and disappears when it is not. Vibrates with each connection status.  The colours of EVERY element in the clock can be customised in the configuration menu!!  The second hand can be hidden, and the clock only updated every minute if desired to save battery.  Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users.  Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

data.description:
*** Also check out and install my new watchfaces, BEACON and Retro Digital! You'll love them as much as this one! ***

--------------------------------------------------------------------Version 2.0: NEW features added!
 - New-look configuration page
 - LIVE preview - options change directly on watch before pressing Save
 - Option to vibrate when disconnected
 - Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel 

Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!! 
----------------------------------------------------------------- 

Watchface with a simple, elegant look which displays the day of the month in the middle, and battery level below, as well as the time in analogue format.

The clock border displays when the watch is Bluetooth connected, and disappears when it is not. Vibrates with each connection status.

The colours of EVERY element in the clock can be customised in the configuration menu!!  The second hand can be hidden, and the clock only updated every minute if desired to save battery.  Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users.

Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2.62: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!
